page.title: 16SCHOOL IN EPPING ON MONDAY
page.content: When the whistle is blown we go upstairs and sit at our desks.Our teacher has words written on the blackboard and we have to make sentences using these words.When I have finished the sentences I read a book.Later I do Maths until breaktime, when I eat crisps or a chocolate biscuit.After break I settle down to English.I next work at my organisation project.I finish it at 12.00, when I have my lunch.After lunch,at 1.10 p.m, Mrs Miller reads to us until 1.30 when we have P.E. After P.E.(Physical Education) I do work cards until French at 2.45 p.m. After French I go home in my mummy's car with my sisters.I get home,have a drink,read, watch television and then my daddy comes home from work.I have tea amd go to bed ready for the next full,happy day.
